nodes.text: Aves was a male Human general of the Republic Army and the leader of the Republic's military efforts on Corellia during the fighting on Corellia during the Galactic War. He was a veteran of the Great Galactic War and fought very bravely at the Battle of Loronar where Aves's strategic thinking and quiet determination were decisive for the victory, gaining also a terrible dislike from the Sith Empire. On Corellia he hired various spacers for some difficult missions.
